pages.title: Cooking
pages.text: I started out with a copper pot. It works wonders, and heats really easily over a stove or campfire.$(br2)Though, ever since I upgraded to an iron cooking pot, I've been able to make a lot more recipes. It's got a bit more room in it.

pages.title: Frying
pages.text: I slapped a ton of bacon on the skillet and fell asleep. Luckily the bacon popped off one by one to the side when it was finished. $(br2)When I don't doze I kind of like just holding the pan over a fire in my main hand and the bacon in my other, slapping on the next strip every minute or so.
